name: Houzen
slogan: Disrupting the London Real Estate market (expanding to new cities!)
description:
Houzen is an intelligent platform that seeks to match residential properties to the right tenants within 24 hours. Our mission is to reshape the lettings industry, without turning people into robots.

Houzen is the simpler, faster, safer way for landlords to connect to expert local agents. Use the latest technology to deal online with independent agents that are constantly assessed to deliver high quality performance. Get the service you need, at a speed that will surprise you. Real agents. Real tenants. Real zen.

jobs.title: Business Development Champion / Leader
jobs.description:
You will work on expanding our current base of clients and agent suppliers. It is expected that you are a self achiever who is passionate about reaching goals and growing really quickly.

Our ideal candidate is:
A self starter, with a passion for getting things done
That loves a challenge
With a can do attitude
Excellent interpersonal skills and are confident explaining new ideas and opportunities
Preferably worked in high growth start-up environments before
Excited by a mission to completely change an industry

You will be provided with all the tools needed (sales training, business knowledge, etc) with and immediate focus on acquiring new clients.

***On top of the base salary you will also benefit form our bonus system so that you can earn 10-20% of the net value of each deal that you close. (this bonus is uncapped)***

jobs.title: VP Engineering / CTO
jobs.description:
The Job

We are looking for someone who will lead our London office, and help us build out our tech stack and our tech team. We alerady have 5 engineers in Pakistan, and a data scientist out of London. We need someone to come in and structure the team, the code, the future hires and take ownership of the engineering roadmap and vision of the company!

From the VP engineering / CTO, we expect a strong sense of leadership (they should tell us what to do, rather than the other way around) and accountability. We will be looking at this person with a 3 to 4 year commitment, so we can co-build and scale the platform across globally. Today, we are based in London and Singapore (with strong presence in China). This year, we are working hard in trying to expand further into China and India. A solid tech leader would give us comfort and confidence that the rest of us can bring users onbaord and together we can create an amazing product ecosystem for users! We have been growing 3x year on year, and are a team of 20 now across locations. This year we aspire to grow 5-6x, and meet our next (big) fundraise metrics. Join us in our journey as we try and become a large (+global) company. 

You will be strong in backend (we use python) and have a good understanding of front end (we use react). You’ll build your own team of developers to help you drive our ambitious goals for the product.  You'll need to have a track record of creating and maintaining interactive web apps, delivering high-quality software and guiding/mentoring fellow team members.

As the lead engineer, you will be closely working with our product Lead for for the strategic development of the platform – whether that’s codebase language, application architecture or hosting infrastructure. 

This is a brilliant opportunity to take an existing, successful, live web application to the next level. 

Responsibilities

Owning the development, testing, deployment and technical strategy of Houzen Xchange.

Manage our current tech team of 5 people located abroad.

Technical Skills

Python, Django
Highly proficient in HTML5, JavaScript.
Working knowledge of React.js
AWS and Continuous Deployment
Browser testing and multi-browser/multi-platform compatibility
Familiarity with accessibility standards
Strong grasp of data protection and web application security principles
Some experience of implementing and managing payment processors
Agile software development experience
Must be London-based, our office is near Liverpool Street/Moorgate.

jobs.title: Sales/Business Dev Champion
jobs.description:
Superfast growth curve
Uncapped commission on deals closed
Mentorship and Lean 6 Sigma Training provided
International team representing 10+ countries
We are looking for sales champions to join our team  ASAP!

The ambition: We have rewritten the rules of lettings in London already, and are already pitching for global accounts in Ireland and Germany. In 2019, we aspire to expand to new cities across UK and Asia. You can be a part of it!

Our customers: are some of the largest landlords in London (who own 500-1000 or more units) and small and mid size letting agencies (we also have a cool product for tenants, with exclusive deals from Uber, Revolut etc.) 

Our pitch (to landlords): We find tenants within 5 days! 

Our vision (for 2019): To find tenants within 24 hours!

Your potential tasks:

Researching new potential areas we could expand to
Onboarding new users (agents) on the platform 
Face to face meetings with clients, gathering feedback
Coming up with new ideas for property sales 
Activating clients and making sure they stay active on the platform
...and much more!

Our Sales Champion role take part in houzen’s growth program, which lets you learn and even lead your own team after just a couple of months! We don’t make you to do admin tasks - here you will be equipped with hands-on business experience, and your ideas could be included in the company’s business plan.

First 3 months: learning stage - talk to everyone, participate in all the activities in the company and even do some mystery shopping/competitor checks!

4-8 months: steady stage - become a specialist and mentor juniors

Finally: growth stage - lead a team and become a shareholder!

Your attitude:

Customer-focused
Team-focused 
You work towards finding solutions, not problems
Keen to get in the field and really understand your customer
You go the extra mile to delight your customers
You’ll never give up!
You’d like to change the way business is done currently
Offer —>

£15,000 - £25,000 for BD Associates 

£25,000-£40,000 for BD Leaders 

UNCAPPED BONUS/Revenue Share (Take home up to 10-25% of all revenues generated). This could easily result in a bonus of GBP 400-3000 pm. 

Fast career progression to leadership: Extensive mentoring from a very strong leadership. Opportunity to be a part of changing an entire industry. Fast promotions (our first employee went from intern to leader and shareholder in two years).

Lean Sigma training and certification: All employees receive LSS training and certification

Please note, we can’t currently provide visas, so we can only offer this opportunity for those with the right to work in the UK.

jobs.title: Sales Leader
jobs.description:
Houzen is building a global stock exchange for residential real estate. The company values strong leadership, however the real differentiator would be someone who can roll up their sleeves and get stuff done. Think of the role as a 90:10 split between execution: strategy, or strategising in evening, and implementing during the day! We're ideally looking for someone with strong SME sales background. 
 
The role:
*direct responsibilities would be to lead a specific area of London and a small team (2-3 people)
*you would be seen as a future leader from day one.
*main tasks: leading and influencing property agents, getting them to sign up on our platform, view properties available and book viewings, then making sure the users are actually performing later on
*hands-on: phone calls and in-person meetings would ideally take most of your time
*whenever you're not with a customer or in contact with customer, you're probably wasting your time

About you:
*2-4 years of sales experience
*some managerial experience
*familiar with SME sales market
*generalist mindset, you should have a flexible mind as your role is expected to keep strengthening as the company expects unprecedented growth over next 12-24 months.
*You must have in the past led teams or situations as a person, professional or a sports person
*Undying ‘‘won’t give up at any cost’’ attitude and has an ‘‘eternally optimist’’’ view on life
*Respects the ‘‘Customer is King’’ philosophy
*Loves learning new concepts and solving problems, and won’t leave the drawing (and more importantly execution ground) board till the problem is solved
*Is excited about rewriting the rules of a $220tn asset class
*Wants to potentially build a business themselves in future.
  
Our culture:
*Everyone is expected to go to any length to understand the customer inside out and genuinely work towards finding solutions for their needs, and then go the extra mile each time to delight them.
*Every team member is very inclusive and collaborative (and a bit unreasonably crazy!).
*Houzen strongly believes that only strong and determined teams build strong businesses, and hence each new team member should be aligned to our philosophy and work ethic.

Offer: 30-40K GBP (based on experience) + profit share (linked to revenue generation). In year 1 itself, opportunity to take home 60k+ or more (base + profit share).

jobs.title: Equity partners : Leadership programme (CTO, CIO, CFO, CPO, COO etc)
jobs.description:
Houzen is hiring equity partners to grow the business!


We have had ~3 years of strong growth now, and have successfully landed in a pre-series A growth stage. We are now 21 FTEs strong. In terms of leaders, we have two GMs, the founder himself and a strong "foundation team" who lead marketing, product, and asia expansion - who all have earned shareholding in the company. Houzen strongly belives in a long term and sustainable growth model, where we want to build and grow the company with a strong skin in the game culture. Due to several reasons and drivers, houzen (including our investors) now very confidently believes that we will continue to run and grow over the next 2 to 3 decades hence we are building for massive scale and hence looking for enterprising leaders who want to scale up their careers in a lower risk environment. 


For this reason, we are open-mindedly experimenting with a new concept of bringing onboard "equity partners". Equity partners are common in law firms and consulting firms where strong partner level people come in with their own clients / skills / background and small investment to help grow their own P&L through the firms platform with a strong skin in the game. We want to deploy the same logic and bring leaders for 


(i) operations (head of, or COO, Chief of commercial)

(ii) technology (CTO, VP Engineering)

(iii) Data science / Deep tech (Chief Data Scientist, head of deep tech)

(iii) product (Chief of Product)

(iv) institutional/private equity, (head of PE, Chief of Investments)

(v) sales/business development (head of acquisition, head of sales, head of customer success)


We would expect these leaders to invest in the business (on discounted favorable terms) so they have a skin in the game, and we would expect them to run a part of the business as if it was their own!

 

About the company:

Houzen is building a global stock exchange for residential real estate. The company values the strong consulting rigour however the real differentiator would be someone who can roll up their sleeves and get stuff done. Think of all roles as a 90:10 split between execution: strategy, or strategising in evening, and implementing during the day! The equity partner roles will transition into P&L leadership (title- regional/country GM/head of ops), or head of customer acquisition (who scales up sales, business development, partnerships team). Even with a specialist background you must have a generalist mindset; as your role is expected to keep strengthening and potentially changing as the company expects unprecedented growth over next 12-24 months. Direct responsibilities would be to lead either people/functions, accounts, or regions. You would be seen as a future leader from day one. Houzen is also currently pitching to clients in Germany and France hence local language or work experience would be an added bonus. 


The Company Houzen is a fast growing property tech venture which aspires to match properties with customers i.e. tenants/buyers in “real time”. Houzen works with some of the most prestigious institutional landlord accounts in UK, and competes (and outperforms easily) head-on with the largest six global RE agencies such as Foxtons, Savills, JLL et al. Houzen’s customers are large landlords and developers as supply (who own 500-1000 or more units) and small and mid-size letting and estate agencies on the demand side. Houzen investors include some of the most prominent and influential angel investors from across Europe - they are mostly ex-clients of the founder from his PE days, and are partner level execs at leading PE / RE / Tech funds. Their advisor is the ex-global CFO, Deutsche Bank, who previously used to be the global CFO at BMW group. In ~two years of building the business, the founder has successfully installed a repeatable and scalable institutional sales and delivery model. Houzen now works with hundreds of real estate agents across the UK (and China). Supply has grown 5-6x since August 2018 and is expected to grow another 3x by May 2019. As one could imagine, with successful sales comes the need to structure, optimise and build for scale and hence the need to bring in enterprising professionals to take the business to the next level. All these roles would work alongside the Founder as his right hand in helping optimise client delivery, and customer acquisition (on both supply and demand sides). 


The Founder was a Senior partner at a global M&A/PE shop himself - he values the consulting/banking work ethic and wants to start hiring through an equity partner model to grow with a skin in the game and sustainable scalability mindset. He would mentor these equity partners/future leaders closely over time, and prepare the company for a 20-30 year scalability so that all shareholders partake in the growth and financial payoffs in the end. Previously the founder Saurabh also helped grow (internationally) and exit a restaurant SaaS business for $220m in little over two years of inception. 


Each person at Houzen is customer-focused first, team-focused second and role-focused third. Everyone is expected to go to any length to understand the customer inside out and genuinely work towards finding solutions for their needs, and then go the extra mile each time to delight them. Every team member is very inclusive and collaborative (and a bit unreasonably crazy!). Houzen strongly believes that only strong and determined teams build strong businesses, and hence each new team member should be aligned to our philosophy and work ethic. 


Requirements (Important)

You must have a clear reason for why you want to work with an early stage business such as Houzen other than to get out of a predictable corporate job, brag to your friends about the cool start-up you now work with, or simply place entrepreneurship on your CV. Some of us have an uncanny “need” and “eccentricity” to want to build stuff, lead people from the front, challenge the status quo even if it came with difficulties, pain, and low upfront monetary benefits. Only reach out to us if you think you are the latter. 


For P&L equity partners: 2-4 years experience at a top-tier consulting firm (preferably BCG, Accenture, Bain) + 1.5+ years in a start-up previously or has attempted to build a business in the past.

You must have in the past led teams or situations as a person, professional or a sports person. Undying ‘‘won’t give up at any cost’’ attitude and has an ‘‘eternally optimist’’’ view on life Respects the ‘‘Customer is King’’ philosophy. Loves learning new concepts and solving problems, and won’t leave the drawing (and more importantly execution ground) board till the problem is solved. Is excited about rewriting the rules of a $220tn asset class. Wants to potentially build a business themselves in future. Since customer orientation and team dynamics are so important for us, we would love to see tangible evidence of when you served difficult customers, led teams, played competitive sports, or in general, led yourself or your team towards winning! Worked and lived in multiple European countries, but not necessary. European languages also ideal Location: London, the with potential to travel (or be based in Europe in future)


Salary/Compensation: TBD for equity partners. We can sit down together and model out a modest annual compensation of 20-40K GBP (based on needs) + direct profit share (linked to revenue generation or fundraising targets for company) + ESOPs + the purchased equity on discount. In year 1 itself, opportunity to take home 50k-150k or more depending on your capability.

Previously the founder Saurabh also helped grow (internationally) and exit a restaurant SaaS business for $220m in little over two years of inception.

Each person at Houzen is customer-focused first, team-focused second and role-focused third. Every team member is very inclusive and collaborative (and a bit unreasonably crazy!).
